message.body: Yes,I told you you're welcome lol
Can you send me the address?
Hey. I'm sorry if I was rude last night. No sleep and smash bros makes me pretty aggressive. I was gonna just direct you to the house then Cindy warned me that the group might be going bowling.
So I can't drop by if you all were going bowling?
No. Cindy was trying to convey that finding parking would be a hassle just to leave right after
If we were bowling it would've been better for you to just meet us there.
Gotcha. Thanks for the apology. It's fine.
No problem. It was just on my mind since I left. You guys enjoy the rest of the night?
I can't imagine. I was already running on fumes
Are ya ready for tomorrow? Or is it Tuesday when you start?
Tomorrow. And I feel like I'm going to have a panic arrack tonight.
I don't suppose I could help you prepare in any way?
You'll be fine. Like I said. They hired you and want you to be there. Just take deep breaths and remember you belong there.
